name: The Un-Pink Lady Cocktail
description: This version of the Pink Lady, a classic cocktail dating to the early 20th century, is definitely on the paler side of the color spectrum.

recipeInstructions.text: Add gin, applejack, lemon juice, egg white, and pomegranate molasses to cocktail shaker. Shake dry (without ice) 10 seconds to emulsify egg white. Add ice and shake until well chilled, at least 15 seconds.
Strain into serving glass, garnish with mint sprig.
